name: Are You A Villain?
description:
Hi, again. I am participating in my second GameJam but this time, to spice things up, it is a 3 day Jam!

Theme: Rom ... (I ignored this theme but not on purpose)
Limitation: The Player is the Villain 

What have I learned? Read the description. I have not read the whole GameJam text and was not aware of the theme. I just saw the limitation, damn! 
Creating a game in 3 days is hard as a rookie in GameDev.

Graphics: The graphics are from kenney.nl
Sound: I bought it in the www.humblebundle.com RPG Maker Bundle
Engine: Unity 2019.3.7f1 (unity.com)

Known bugs (sadly):
You can get stuck in the ground
